QuestData.Title: A Monk's Focus
QuestData.Description:
You fought well against the harpies, but we all need to become stronger to face what lies ahead.
The first step is to find a nice place to meditate and focus yourself.
A monk is only as strong as they are focused.
Come. I know of such a place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Kee-La and meditate with her.
